title: Potion of Healing
contents: text | When you drink this red fluid in this vial, you regain 2d4+2 hitpoints.
text | Drinking or administering a potion takes 1 action.

title: Potion of Greater Healing
contents: text | When you drink this red fluid in this vial, you regain 4d4+4 hitpoints.
text | Drinking or administering a potion takes 1 action.

title: Potion of Superior Healing
contents: text | When you drink this red fluid in this vial, you regain 8d4+8 hitpoints.
text | Drinking or administering a potion takes 1 action.
